imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Glowing white ghost character sprite with transparent edges for 3D texture (ghost-sprite.dim_256x256.png)
- Dark misty forest background with fog and bare trees (forest-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Eerie full moon with atmospheric glow (moon.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Create a 3D game environment using Three.js and React Three Fiber with a dark, spooky atmosphere
Implement ghost entities that float and move around the 3D environment
Add player interaction to catch or interact with ghosts using mouse clicks or keyboard controls
Display game UI showing current score and game status
Create a cohesive dark horror visual theme with eerie colors, atmospheric typography, and ghostly aesthetic elements throughout the entire application interface
Render generated ghost character images and atmospheric background assets from frontend/public/assets/generated directory

new_feature_requests.summary: Implement score tracking system that records caught ghosts
